amendment.description: An amendment numbered 48 printed in Part A of House Report 117-405 to require additional notifications and oversight of Section 333 funding for the governments of the Northern Triangle.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to require additional notifications and oversight of Section 333 funding for the governments of the Northern Triangle.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Torres (CA) amendment (A021) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 209 - 217 (Roll no. 328).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A021) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A021) offered by Mrs. Torres (CA).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Torres (CA) amendment (A021) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 209 - 217 (Roll no. 328).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Torres (CA) amendment (A021) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 209 - 217 (Roll no. 328).
